home.catch_phrase: My job is to bring ideas to life, creating authentic and memorable solutions.

skills.DevelopText: I've developed projects using various tech stacks: From web fundamentals (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript) to CMS platforms like WordPress and HubSpot, and modern technologies such as React, TypeScript, and Next.js. Additionally, I've worked on academic projects involving embedded programming in C/C++ and machine learning with Python and TensorFlow.
skills.UXDesignText: With a focus always on user needs, I believe good design is not only visually striking but also delivers results. Using Figma, I create interfaces and user flows that prioritize usability and experience.
skills.DesignText: Having mastered the primary tools of the Adobe Creative Cloud, I've been responsible for creating social media artwork and graphic materials for various companies.
skills.VideoEditText: As an video editor, I've worked on crafting narratives to transform concepts into engaging stories, while also worked on motion design projects to create animations and promotional videos.

about.AboutText: I'm Luiz, nice to meet you! I work as a Front-End Developer, and during my career, I've developed projects of diverse scopes: From building SEO-optimized websites focused on performance to maintaining complex web systems in high-availability environments. My strong creative streak, honed through prior roles as a designer and video editor, has sharpened my critical eye for usability and UX/UI best practices in applications. I'm passionate about programming and continually seek to expand my knowledge, having explored mobile development, game creation, and machine learning with a focus on computer vision.
